titles.title: Overseas Private Investment Corporation Amendments Act of 1997
To amend the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 with respect to the activities of the Overseas Private Investment Corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Economic Policy and Trade.

bill.summary: 5/20/1997--Introduced. Overseas Private Investment Corporation Amendments Act of 1997 - Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to increase the ceiling on the maximum contingent liability outstanding at any one time for the financing of investment guarantees issued by the Overseas Private Investment Corporation (OPIC) as well as of direct U.S. investment. Extends OPIC's authority to issue investment insurance and such guarantees through FY 2000.
